work_experience.text:
-  Present  (2 years 5 months)

Software Engineering Intern at

(4 months)

Automate Testbed reinstalls
In order to ensure a clean test environment and good quality of test results, testbeds must be
 periodically reinstalled. This was being done manually and this was a time-consuming task and
 prone to human errors, affecting both quality and availability of the testbeds.

My project is to write python scipts to reinstall all components in testbed automatically.
There are 4 different components of the testbed:
1) Switches
2) Network control machines (NCS)
3) Servers connected to the switches (End-hosts)
4) A proxy machine located close to the testbed.

Software Engineering Intern at Alibaba.com
July 2013  -  August 2013  (2 months)

Summer intern in alibaba.
Write test tools to support some protocol in Java. 

My work:
1. Add the function that user could upload their Jython, Groovy, Rhino code, and get the results for
 them. 
2. Add the function that user could download or upload their file.
3. Support the KFC protocol which is used in alibaba or taobao.com
